divs: Sighting DetailsI had two sightings of the same type of aircraft once in greensboro nc back on 2000, and once in moncks corners sc on 2005 in the month of march early in the morning, both of the objects were, oval shaped with a slight dome on the top, both were clearly visible with a dull off white colored light that seemed to glow through the crafts hull. the object sighted in greensboro came down from the outer atmosphere dropped down in one motion while turning to level off after it leveled off it seemed to whobble up and down slighty,I counted in my head 8 seconds approx. before loosing sight of it.the object seen in moncks corners was moving across the sky due north, level straight across the sky, it never whobbled. Both of the aircraft looked the same in size and shape,and also color.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Greensboro
There were no other sightings in Greensboro on or around November 15th 2000
Summary: the object dropped down ,and turn to level off in one motion with a high rate of speed...
